description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Xtreme Polygon 2 is the second in the Xtreme Polygon Series. Xtreme Polygon 2 includes new game modes, such as Arcade mode, Versus Mode, Unlimited Mode, Boss Battle Mode and more, with in game awards and four player co-op or versus play!
description.short: Xtreme Polygon 2 is the second in the Xtreme Polygon Series. Xtreme Polygon 2 includes new game modes, such as Arcade mode, Versus Mode, Unlimited Mode, Boss Battle Mode and more, with in game awards and four player co-op or versus play!
